article_title: FIGHTING FOR THE RIGHT: 3 GOP candidates for Indiana 9th District race debate at JHS

article_metadata.author: ELIZABETH BEILMAN

og.description: JEFFERSONVILLE — National security, jobs and the environment were among the broad topics three of the five Republican candidates in the 9th Congressional District race discussed Wednesday night.
